main.name: Kankan Paramanik
main.bio: I am Kankan Paramanik. I am a student of third year from Computer Science and Engneering Department of National Institute of Technology, Durgapur. I am a Web developer. My instruments in doing so is React JS, Redux, Firebase, HTML and CSS. I have aldo build certain projects on Machine Learnig. I also practice competetive programming and have 3 starts in Codechef. My CGPA till my third semester is 8.95.  My goal is to be a better person every day and learn from every single thing.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me by

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree, Computer Science and Engineering

work.title: Researcher
work.description: I have contributed in a research paper on Face regeneration using Generative Adversarial Networks, Convolution Neural Networks and Deep Learning. Project was done by mounting 6000 already exixting faces to generate arbitary faces.

testimonials.text: I have been directly involved with Kankan for sometime now. He is a very bright student with an amazing technical competency. He quickly grabs new concepts and acts on them. He is diligent, hardworking and a punctual student. His presence in any team will add immense value to the same. I highly recommend Kankan based on his technical capabilities and soft skills
